```{r}
library(ggplot2, quietly = T)
library(tidyverse, quietly = T)
library(readr, quietly = T)
load('data_20190822_luad_lusc_rnaseq_normalized.RData')

t1 <- ggplot(d_luad, aes(race, pack_years_smoked)) + 
  geom_violin(aes(fill=race)) + geom_boxplot(fill='white', width=0.3)

t2 <- ggplot(d_luad, aes(race, pack_years_smoked)) + 
  geom_violin(aes(fill=race))  + 
  geom_dotplot(binaxis='y', stackdir='center', dotsize=0.3)

t3 <- ggplot(d_luad, aes(pack_years_smoked)) + 
  geom_histogram(bins=100, colour="purple", fill="white")+ 
  geom_density(alpha=.2, fill="#FF6666")

t4 <- ggplot(d_luad, aes(cigarettes_per_day)) + 
  geom_histogram(bins=100, colour="red", fill="white")+ 
  geom_density(alpha=.2, fill="#FF6666")


library(cowplot)
p = plot_grid(t1, t2,t3,t4, ncol=2)
ggsave('test.pdf', p)

#theme_set(theme_gray(base_size = 20)) # font size



```
